messages.content: Kevin Ramirez works with Christine Hernandez.
Christine Hernandez is a colleague of Emma Baker.
Emma Baker works with Sharon Rogers.
Sharon Rogers is a colleague of Samuel Ward.
Samuel Ward works with Stephen Gibson.
Stephen Gibson is a colleague of Jerry Ramos.
Jerry Ramos works with Richard Hughes.
Richard Hughes is a colleague of Katherine Moore.
Katherine Moore works with Kimberly Allen.
Kimberly Allen is a colleague of Pamela Sanchez.

queries.question: Are Kevin Ramirez and Pamela Sanchez related to each other at work through colleagues relations?

reference_answer.text: Yes, they are indirect colleagues according to their graph relations.
